title: LLM Test Endpoints - Tasks Document
response:
Feedback Summary (4 comments):

General Comments:
1. also make sure there's no auth middleware for this "/test" endpoints

Specific Text Comments:
1. "- [ ] 1. Add environment variables for AI services...": disregard this, i already added it manually
2. "qdrant/js-client-rest": i dont think we need to use the sdk, for simplicity can we use qdrant's builtin rest endpoints to interact with the db?
3. "- [ ] 3. Create AI feature directory structure
  -...": dont create subdirectories if it only contains single file, like avoid doing this "/controllers/llm_controller.ts", it should only be "llm_controller.ts". The file name is just a sample

  - _Leverage: existing env.ts patterns_
